1119960.name: Newfound Courage - Winter's Fair
1119960.description:
It's Winter's Fair in Silverpine and for the first time since before the time that wasn't counted - it's snowing. Strange events occur as someone... or something seems determined to ruin the town's most important annual event. Will Alex and his friends save the day?

Come home to Silverpine and find out.

Key Features

  • A short story (about 45 minutes) focused on narrative with a combination of fresh new puzzles along with old favourites.
  • A homely holiday story about chosen family told in Newfound Courage's familiar lore-rich low fantasy world.
  • Revisit your favourite townfolk and see how they handle the joys (and stresses) of the holidays.
  • Brand new pixel art settings, characters, and animations.
  • Featuring an extended soundtrack of compositions by award-winning composer and BAFTA crew member Jessica Kelly.


To play, open the core Newfound Courage game in your Steam library, click the 'Play' button and select Winter's Fair from the dialogue box.
1119960.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
